keyPolicies.policyDescription: Deal with debts, safeguard the economy for the long term and keep mortgage rates low.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Cutting Income Tax and freezing Fuel Duty
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Help families be more financially secure.
Back small business and enterprise with better infrastructure and lower job taxes.
Ensure the council gets a fair share of the Scottish Government’s £24.4m pothole fund.
Helping young people learn a trade, kick-start their careers and get on in life.
Help hardworking Scots provide stability for themselves and their families with affordable homes and stamp duty reform.
Cutting tax on pension pots and keeping the Triple Lock to ensure the state pension rises in line to give dignity and security in retirement.
An in/out referendum on the European Union by 2017.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Supporting more powers for the Scottish Parliament
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make it more responsible to Scottish taxpayers.

issues.brexitEurope: An in/out referendum on the European Union by 2017.
issues.economy: Reducing the deficit so we deal with our debts, safeguard the economy for the long term and keep mortgage rates low.

housing.content: Help hardworking Scots provide stability for themselves and their families with affordable homes and stamp duty reform.

contactInformation.address: Conservative Office, 570 Mosspark Boulevard, Glasgow G52 1SD
